  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:atlas.fri.uni-lj.si:trubar1:uciteljska/111912</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>trubar1:uciteljska/111912</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="sl">Kje živi?</string>
            <string language="en">Where does he live?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wo lebt er?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Où habite-t-il ?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Onde vive?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Dove vive?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πού ζει;</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">¿Dónde él vive?</string>
          </title>
          <language>sl</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">Izvirna datoteka Hot Potatoes, primerna za prilagajanje po svojih potrebah.</string>
            <string language="en">Logical riddle that requires reasoning and observation. Goal is to find the inhabitant of every house. (Hot Potatoes source code is included).</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">hiša</string>
            <string language="en">house</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">prebivalec</string>
            <string language="en">inhabitant</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">uganka</string>
            <string language="en">riddle</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">sklepanje</string>
            <string language="en">reasoning</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Logisches Rätsel, das Argumentation und Beobachtung 
benötigt. Ziel ist, den Einwohner jedes Hauses zu finden. 
(heißes Kartoffelquellenprogramm ist enthalten).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Énigme logique qui exige le raisonnement et 
l'observation. Le but est de trouver l'habitant de chaque 
maison. (le code source chaud de pommes de terre est inclus).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Riddle lógico que requer o raciocínio e a observação. 
O objetivo é encontrar o habitante de cada casa. (o 
código de fonte quente das batatas é incluído).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Riddle logico che richiede il ragionamento e 
l'osservazione. L'obiettivo è di trovare l'abitante di ogni 
casa. (il codice sorgente caldo delle patate è incluso).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Λογικό αίνιγμα που απαιτεί συλλογισμός και 
παρατήρηση. Ο στόχος είναι να βρεθεί ο κάτοικος κάθε 
σπιτιού. (Ο καυτός κώδικας πηγής πατατών 
συμπεριλαμβάνεται).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Criba lógica que requiere el razonamiento y la 
observación. La meta es encontrar al habitante de cada casa. 
(el código de fuente caliente de las patatas es incluido).</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Haus</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Einwohner</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Rätsel</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Argumentation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">maison</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">habitant</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">énigme</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">raisonnement</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">casa</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">habitante</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">riddle</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">raciocínio</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">casa</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">abitante</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">riddle</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">ragionamento</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">σπίτι</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">κάτοικος</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">αίνιγμα</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">συλλογισμός</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">casa</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">habitante</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">criba</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">razonamiento</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
